name: Mario Bros. 3D
description:
This is a Remake of the Original Mario Bros. from the Arcade, but as a 3D Game.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • X key to change perspective
  • ESC to exit

Easy Controls eh!? 
anyways, share ur score in the comments below :}

UNDER DEVELOPMENT... more on it coming soon so stay tuned ;)

This Game is Made with Godot 4 and MagicaVoxel
